The Architectural Gap

You are here because standard AI prompting has failed you. It fails because it guesses; Gemini 3 Pro reasons. The FlutterFlow compiler is a rigid environment‚Äîit does not tolerate ambiguity. This dashboard forces you to adopt a constraint-first workflow.

Failure Analysis

The Non-Negotiables

Ignoring these rules is a strategic choice to fail.

üì¶

Zero External Deps

Do not dream of packages you haven't installed. If it's not in Pubspec, it doesn't exist.

üõ°Ô∏è

Strict Null Safety

Dart is strict. Use `required` keywords. Handle every `?` potential null. No lazy coding.

üß©

Boilerplate Lock

No `void main()`. Logic must live inside the `StatelessWidget` or `StatefulWidget` class structure.

üîó

Param Sync

Dart `final double width` MUST match FF UI Argument `width`. Case sensitive. 1:1 parity.
